messages.text: Hey team, we're experiencing high latency on the API. Response times are over 2 seconds.
I checked the database. There are missing indexes on the users table. The user_id column doesn't have an index.
Good catch! Let me add the index. Running: CREATE INDEX idx_users_user_id ON users(user_id);
Index created successfully. Queries are now completing in under 100ms.
Confirmed! API latency is back to normal. Thanks everyone!
We should document this. The pattern is: whenever we add user-related features, make sure we have proper indexes on foreign keys.
